name: OD
description:
This is a physics-based graphics interaction program that will be available for desktop and vr. This is the beta version. There are many ways to interact, but for the sake of this demo these are some simplified controls. In the browser it will crash for about 30 seconds or so until it allocates enough ram (the browser version is for demo purposes). Once this grueling period is over then it does run smoothly. 

"O" toggles the ui.

"G" and "L" launch cool things.

"space" applies some magic.

Feel free to press random buttons and see what happens. "R" resets the environment.

Most importantly, crank some music and sit back.
